site_name: Kingston Hill Campus, Kingston Business School
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 19/01076/FUL (Erection of single storey building for use as a management suite and reception. Internal and external alterations to existing buildings to facilitate refurbishment of existing student accommodation, including installation of PVpanels, with associated parking and landscaping arrangements) dated 10/09/2019. Amendment to consist of alterations to the number of short and long stay bike store spaces

decision_conditions: The application is submitted under Section 96a of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. The Council considers the reduction of 46 cycle parking spaces associated with the approved scheme (comprising 12 short stay Sheffield stands and 32 long stay spaces) to be a material change to the original permission and as such, the S96A application for a non-material amendment is refused.
